parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.10</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Math - Geometry </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns list of objects intersected by given line from ''begPos'' to ''endPos''. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''lineIntersectsObjs''' [begPos, endPos, withObj, ignoreObj, sortByDistance, flags] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> begPos: [[PositionASL]] - virtual line start </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> endPos: [[PositionASL]] - virtual line end </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> withObj: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> ignoreObj: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> sortByDistance: [[Boolean]] - [[true]]: furthest object first, closest object last; [[false]]: unsorted </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER5</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p6</name>=<value> flags: [[Number]]
<br>1 - CF_ONLY_WATER 
<br>2 - CF_NEAREST_CONTACT 
<br>4 - CF_ONLY_STATIC 
<br>8 - CF_ONLY_DYNAMIC 
<br>16 - CF_FIRST_CONTACT 
<br>32 - CF_ALL_OBJECTS (Usable only with CF_FIRST_CONTACT and it will check one contact per object)
<br>Flags can be combined: 2 + 4 = 6 is CF_NEAREST_OBJECT + CF_ONLY_STATIC</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER6</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] of [[Object|Objects]] - intersecting objects </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>Sto = [];
Fn = {
  {
    Sto [[set]] [_foreachindex,[[lineIntersectsObjs]] [([[eyePos]] [[player]]),([[ATLtoASL]] [[screenToWorld]] [0.5,0.5]),[[objNull]],[[objNull]],[[false]],_x]];
  } [[forEach]] [1,2,4,8,16,32];
  [[hintSilent]] [[format]] ["
  ONLY_WATER: %1, 
  NEAREST_CONTACT: %2, 
  ONLY_STATIC: %3, 
  ONLY_DYNAMIC: %4,
  FIRST_CONTACT: %5,
  ALL_OBJECTS: %6",
  Sto [[select]] 0,Sto [[select]] 1,Sto [[select]] 2,Sto [[select]] 3,Sto [[select]] 4,Sto [[select]] 5];
};
["sample_id","onEachFrame","Fn"] [[call]] [[BIS_fnc_addStackedEventHandler]];
//Example display objects' array in the middle of the screen sorted by 6 flags</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[lineIntersectsSurfaces]], [[lineIntersectsWith]], [[terrainIntersect]], [[terrainIntersectASL]], [[terrainIntersectAtASL]], [[lineIntersects]], [[intersect]], [[cursorObject]], [[cursorTarget]], [[checkVisibility]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<dd class="note">
Distance sorting is relative to object model center, and not intersect position.
</dd>
